title: How to Make a Mix and Match Meal

steps.headline: Choose one food from each of the four groups above.
Season to taste with salt, pepper, soy sauce, onion flakes, garlic, etc.
steps.description: Choose spices, herbs and seasonings that you enjoy eating.

steps.headline: Reduce heat to lowest setting.
steps.description: Cover pan and simmer 30 minutes until pasta or rice is tender.

steps.headline: Stir occasionally to prevent rice and pasta from sticking.

text: Choose one food from each of the four groups above.  Stir together in skillet.  Season to taste with salt, pepper, soy sauce, onion flakes, garlic, etc. Choose spices, herbs and seasonings that you enjoy eating. Bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to lowest setting. Cover pan and simmer 30 minutes until pasta or rice is tender. Stir occasionally to prevent rice and pasta from sticking.  Stir in cheese, if using.
